object.name: forwardMessages
object.description: Use this method to forward multiple messages of any kind. If some of the specified messages can't be found or forwarded, they are skipped. Service messages and messages with protected content can't be forwarded. Album grouping is kept for forwarded messages. On success, an array of MessageId of the sent messages is returned.
object.html_description: Use this method to forward multiple messages of any kind. If some of the specified messages can't be found or forwarded, they are skipped. Service messages and messages with protected content can't be forwarded. Album grouping is kept for forwarded messages. On success, an array of MessageId of the sent messages is returned.
object.rst_description: Use this method to forward multiple messages of any kind. If some of the specified messages can't be found or forwarded, they are skipped. Service messages and messages with protected content can't be forwarded. Album grouping is kept for forwarded messages. On success, an array of :class:`aiogram.types.message_id.MessageId` of the sent messages is returned.

annotations.description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format @channelusername)
annotations.html_description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format @channelusername)
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format :code:`@channelusername`)
annotations.name: chat_id

annotations.description: Unique identifier for the target message thread (topic) of a forum; for forum supergroups and private chats of bots with forum topic mode enabled only
annotations.html_description: Unique identifier for the target message thread (topic) of a forum; for forum supergroups and private chats of bots with forum topic mode enabled only
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier for the target message thread (topic) of a forum; for forum supergroups and private chats of bots with forum topic mode enabled only
annotations.name: message_thread_id

annotations.description: Identifier of the direct messages topic to which the messages will be forwarded; required if the messages are forwarded to a direct messages chat
annotations.html_description: Identifier of the direct messages topic to which the messages will be forwarded; required if the messages are forwarded to a direct messages chat
annotations.rst_description: Identifier of the direct messages topic to which the messages will be forwarded; required if the messages are forwarded to a direct messages chat
annotations.name: direct_messages_topic_id

annotations.description: Unique identifier for the chat where the original messages were sent (or channel username in the format @channelusername)
annotations.html_description: Unique identifier for the chat where the original messages were sent (or channel username in the format @channelusername)
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier for the chat where the original messages were sent (or channel username in the format :code:`@channelusername`)
annotations.name: from_chat_id

annotations.description: A JSON-serialized list of 1-100 identifiers of messages in the chat from_chat_id to forward. The identifiers must be specified in a strictly increasing order.
annotations.html_description: A JSON-serialized list of 1-100 identifiers of messages in the chat from_chat_id to forward. The identifiers must be specified in a strictly increasing order.
annotations.rst_description: A JSON-serialized list of 1-100 identifiers of messages in the chat *from_chat_id* to forward. The identifiers must be specified in a strictly increasing order.
annotations.name: message_ids

annotations.description: Sends the messages silently. Users will receive a notification with no sound.
annotations.html_description: Sends the messages silently. Users will receive a notification with no sound.
annotations.rst_description: Sends the messages `silently <https://telegram.org/blog/channels-2-0#silent-messages>`_. Users will receive a notification with no sound.
annotations.name: disable_notification

annotations.description: Protects the contents of the forwarded messages from forwarding and saving
annotations.html_description: Protects the contents of the forwarded messages from forwarding and saving
annotations.rst_description: Protects the contents of the forwarded messages from forwarding and saving
annotations.name: protect_content
